short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin to open files with xdg-open in sonrarr and radarr

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin adds 'play icons' and 'folder icons' to Sonarr episodes and Radar films page listing.
Since Sonarr and Radarr are only library management tools, they do not, and currently have no plans to offer desktop integration with your media player or file manager.

This plugin thereby adds this functionality, allowing the user (you) to click on the provided icons.

After the install of the plugin, you will need to install the server side companion script, which can be found on, https://github.com/dmzoneill/sodarr-chrome-plugin/

Follow the instructions there to complete the setup.

Once installed visit your Sonarr/Radarr media management web address http://your-address/ and refresh the page.

Navigate to the files or episodes and find the icons as specified.

Happy viewing!
